alert.note: Alert for Blair; Clearfield; Huntingdon; Northern Centre; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CLEARFIELD... NORTHWESTERN HUNTINGDON...SOUTHWESTERN CENTRE AND NORTHEASTERN BLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Tyrone, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Tyrone, Philipsburg, Stormstown, Bald Eagle, Warriors Mark, Osceola Mills, Tipton, Chester Hill, Houtzdale, Port Matilda, South Philipsburg, Sandy Ridge, Birmingham, Jeffries, West Decatur, Ramey, Brisbin and Delgrosso`s Amusement Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blair; Clearfield; Huntingdon; Northern Centre; Southern Centre
